import React, { Component } from 'react'; import MuiThemeProvider from '@material-ui/core/styles/MuiThemeProvider'; import AppBar from '@material-ui/core/AppBar'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; //import ImageUploader from 'react-images-upload'; import Upload from "./Upload/Upload" export class ImageUpload extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { show:false } } continue = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(this.props) if (this.props.Uploaded){ this.props.nextStep(); }else{ this.setState({ show:true }); } } back = e => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.prevStep(); } render() { const { values } = this.props; return ( Ramp Request Form

Upload Ramp Images:

StopGap requires three images to process your ramp request.

Take a look at the entryway and envision the placement of the ramp. Take a picture of the entire entrance including the step in front of the doorway and the sidewalk. For a safe turning radius, you will need 42″ of space in addition to the length of the ramp (which is 6 times the height of the step).

Photo of Entire Entryway


Take a look at the entryway and envision the placement of the ramp. Take a picture of the entire entrance including the step in front of the doorway and the sidewalk. For a safe turning radius, you will need 42″ of space in addition to the length of the ramp (which is 6 times the height of the step).

Photo of Left Side Step

Photo of Right Side Step

Please estimate the height of your step and enter them below. Your measurement selection will be verified by StopGap staff by evaluating your measurement photo submissions. We may request new or additional photos to best design the ramp to fit your step.






{this.state.show &&

Please Upload all three images before continue

}
{/*

Upload your Images:

StopGap requires three images to process your ramp request:

  • Photo of entire entryway

    Take a look at the entryway and envision the placement of the ramp. Take a picture of the entire entrance including the step in front of the doorway and the sidewalk. For a safe turning radius, you will need 42″ of space in addition to the length of the ramp (which is 6 times the height of the step).

    * Entryway image loader here *

  • Photo of Left Side Step

    * Left side image loader here *

  • Photo of Right Side Step

    * Right side image loader here *


Please estimate the height of your step and enter them below. Your measurement selection will be verified by StopGap staff by evaluating your measurement photo submissions. We may request new or additional photos to best design the ramp to fit your step.





*/}
) } } export default ImageUpload; /* */
